alert.note: Alert for Barry; Jasper; Lawrence; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN NEWTON...NORTHWESTERN BARRY...WESTERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sarcoxie to near Fairview to 8 miles southeast of Neosho. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monett, Mount Vernon, Sarcoxie, Pierce City, Purdy, Miller, Wheaton, Verona, Fairview, Stotts City, Newtonia, Pioneer, Freistatt, Stella, Wentworth, Stark City, La Russell, Ritchey and Hoberg. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 24 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Missouri.
